title: Strengthening Teaching Method Practical Competencies: Knowledge Translation Model for Integrated Hypertrophic Cardiomyopathy (HCM) Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the molecular mechanisms of hypertrophic cardiomyopathy (including DNA hydroxymethylation).
Learners can analyze histological features of HCM patient tissues (sarcomere distribution, mitochondrial morphology).
Learners can analyze the correlation between mitochondrial genomes and HCM clinical manifestations.
Learners can design HCM diagnostic processes through an integrated anatomy-biochemistry-genetics approach.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
